text:
UPDATE: Just asked MANAFORT's atty KEVIN DOWNING whether he was accusing RICK GATES of lying about the # of affairs he had to: (1) MUELLER's team or (2) on the witness stand.
He paused to ponder, & said he'd get back to me because "I don't want to get cross-wise with the judge."
author: kenvogel

text: And, with that final explosive volley, Gates concludes his testimony against his old boss & mentor Manafort, leaving the jury lots to consider regarding the relative credibility of the two men.

text:
